item.title: Ivannah add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "My tastes are simple: I am easily satisfied with the best." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by Joanna R. Macy
item.description: "If the world is to be healed through human efforts, I am convinced it will be by ordinary people, people whose love for this life is even greater than their fear." -- Joanna R. Macy

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by Confucius
item.description: "It is not the failure of others to appreciate your abilities that should trouble you, but rather your failure to appreciate theirs." -- Confucius

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by Steven Pressfield
item.description: "Creative work is not a selfish act or a bid for attention on the part of the actor. It's a gift to the world and every being in it. Don't cheat us of your contribution. Give us what you've got." -- Steven Pressfield

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by Sri Sri Ravi Shankar
item.description: "I tell you, deep inside you is a fountain of bliss, a fountain of joy. Deep inside your center core is truth, light, love, there is no guilt there, there is no fear there. Psychologists have never looked deep enough." -- Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "At the center of your being you have the answer; you know who you are and you know what you want." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by Luciano Pavarotti
item.description: "Nothing that has happened has made me feel gloomy or remain depressed. I love my life." -- Luciano Pavarotti

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by Epictetus
item.description: "First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do." -- Epictetus

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by Thich Nhat Hanh
item.description: "When another person makes you suffer, it is because he suffers deeply within himself, and his suffering is spilling over. He does not need punishment; he needs help. That's the message he is sending." -- Thich Nhat Hanh

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by Barbara Kingsolver
item.description: "The very least you can do in your life is figure out what you hope for. And the most you can do is live inside that hope. Not admire it from a distance but live right in it, under its roof." -- Barbara Kingsolver

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by Leo Rosten
item.description: "You can understand and relate to most people better if you look at them - no matter how old or impressive they may be - as if they are children. For most of us never really grow up or mature all that much - we simply grow taller. O, to be sure, we laugh less and play less and wear uncomfortable disguises like adults, but beneath the costume is the child we always are, whose needs are simple, whose daily life is still best described by fairy tales." -- Leo Rosten

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by Robert Collier
item.description: "Your chances of success in any undertaking can always be measured by your belief in yourself." -- Robert Collier

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by Ajahn Chah
item.description: "Looking for peace is like looking for a turtle with a mustache: You won't be able to find it. But when your heart is ready, peace will come looking for you. " -- Ajahn Chah

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The difference between genius and stupidity is; genius has its limits." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "History will be kind to me for I intend to write it." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I have nothing to declare except my genius." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by Rudyard Kipling
item.description: "I never made a mistake in my life; at least, never one that I couldn't explain away afterwards." -- Rudyard Kipling

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "It's kind of fun to do the impossible." -- Walt Disney

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by J.M. Barrie
item.description: "If you have it [love], you don't need to have anything else, and if you don't have it, it doesn't matter much what else you have." -- J.M. Barrie

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by Pierre De Beaumarchais
item.description: "where love is concerned, too much is never enough" -- Pierre De Beaumarchais

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by Neville Goddard
item.description: "If a man looks upon any other man and estimates that man as less than himself, then he is stealing from the other. He is stealing the other's birthright - that of equality." -- Neville Goddard

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by C.S. Richardson
item.description: "A man can see a hundred women, lust for a thousand more, but it is one scent that will open his eyes and turn him to love." -- C.S. Richardson

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Reality is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by Madeleine L'Engle
item.description: "You have to write the book that wants to be written. And if the book will be too difficult for grown-ups, then you write it for children." -- Madeleine L'Engle

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by W. Mitchell
item.description: "What I focus on in life is what I get. And if I concentrate on how bad I am or how wrong I am or how inadequate I am, if I concentrate on what I can't do and how there's not enough time in which to do it, isn't that what I get every time? And when I think about how powerful I am, and when I think about what I have left to contribute, and when I think about the difference I can make on this planet, then that's what I get. You see, I recognize that it's not what happens to you; it's what you do about it." -- W. Mitchell

item.title: Ivannah add a quote by Robert F. Kennedy
item.description: "The responsibility of our time is nothing less than a revolution. A revolution that would be peaceful if we are wise enough; humane if we care enough; successful if we are fortunate enough. But a revolution will come whether we will it or not. We can affect it's character, we cannot alter it's inevitability." -- Robert F. Kennedy
